subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Juan Monaco won his third career ATP tour title by beating Potito Starace, 5-7, 6-3, 6-4, in the Austrian Open yesterday in Kitzbühel. Only Rafael Nadal (six titles) and Roger Federer (four) have won more tournaments in 2007 than Monaco, who won in Buenos Aires and Poertschach earlier this year. “I really can’t believe this is true,” the 31st-ranked Monaco said.
